trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Schenectady
There were no other sightings in Schenectady on or around June 15th 1953
Summary: I was 10. Looked like the moon only moved in very erratic motions, hovered, moved again, hovered and then finally flew away.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsOld encounter but worth mentioning. My brother who was 9, we went outdoors with see to see what it was. It disappeared before the sun came up. It hovered over the dense woods behind our house (in the country at that time). UFO's Definitely exist! At first it appeared to be a beautiful full moon. Then as I watched, it moved upwards in the sky and then in erratic directions.... something that was very shocking. I should have woken my parents up, but didn't. My brother and I went outside to explore but weren't able to get anywhere near it.
